page.title: 03SARSON SCHOOL MELTON MOWBRAY
page.content: Sarson was built in 1952.We have a {portrait}of a Mr Sarson hanging in the entrance hall,facing the front door.We have one dining hall,one gym,and one large hall with a large stage at one end.There are two large corridors with class rooms down the south sides,with windows facing south.In the entrance hall there is a staircase which leads to the top main corridor and a small corridor leading to a big music room, and one of the deputy head's office. Our deputy heads are called Mr Fox and Mrs Wilford.Our{head}mistress is called Mrs Turner,who only came last year.There is also a staircase in the middle which leads up to the upstairs main corridor from the down stairs corridor.At the other end of the {school}on the ground floor are the home economics rooms, the needle work room and the CDT rooms for{education.
